Wash dishes with dishwasher
Wash dishes with a dishwasher


[FIND] <dishwasher> (1.1000)
[OPEN] <dishwasher> (1.1000)
[FIND] <plate> (1.1001)
[GRAB] <plate> (1.1001)
[PUTBACK] <plate> (1.1001) <dishwasher> (1.1000)
[WALK] <dish_soap> (1.1002)
[FIND] <dish_soap> (1.1002)
[GRAB] <dish_soap> (1.1002)
[POUR] <dish_soap> (1.1002) <plate> (1.1001)
[CLOSE] <dishwasher> (1.1000)
[SWITCHON] <dishwasher> (1.1000)
